title: Celebrate spring w/ Limited Edition Pansy Blue & Flamingo Pink Panaracer GravelKing tires
content:
Spring is here, and flowers are popping up across the country. If you want to add some flower-inspired color to your gravel ride, Panaracer will soon have just the tires for you. The latest batch of one-time only limited edition rubber includes Pansy Blue, which clearly take some inspiration from the dark blue/purple flowers. On [â€¦]

The post Celebrate spring w/ Limited Edition Pansy Blue & Flamingo Pink Panaracer GravelKing tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
